item.title: #SurvivorsAsk: Interview Paradise Lost for 70000TONS.tv!
item.dc:creator: rhea
item.description: Are you a 70000TONS OF METAL Survivor living in or near Athens, Greece? Would you like to interview PARADISE LOST on December 22 before they play at Piraeus 117 Academy? Visit the Official 70000TONS OF METAL forum and tell us why YOU would be the best candidate to interview the band – if you are […]

item.title: 2 MONTHS!
item.dc:creator: MykillinK
item.description: Sailors! In 2 Months, you will step on board Round 9 of The Original, The World’s Biggest Heavy Metal Cruise! If you have not already reserved your spot for 70000TONS OF METAL 2019, please sign up for our Waiting List now… You definitely don’t want to miss this boat! Only on 70000TONS OF METAL will […]
